version_description:
New feature: MyForums list now synced with your account. Never lose your MyForums list with upgrades or a new device again
New feature: Posts and threads by ignored members do not appear
New feature: Ignored members list
New feature: Ignore a member from the user profile screen
New feature: Visitor messages now show on the user profile screen
Improvement: Notifications list auto-updates after reading a push notification
Improvement: Push notifications for appreciates
Improvement: Font size control setting applies to entire thread
Bug fix: Occasional crash when closing a thread
Bug fix: Display proper error message when forum is closed

New feature: MyForums list now synced with your account. Never lose your MyForums list with upgrades or a new device again
New feature: Posts and threads by ignored members do not appear
New feature: Ignored members list
New feature: Ignore a member from the user profile screen
New feature: Visitor messages now show on the user profile screen
Improvement: Notifications list auto-updates after reading a push notification
Improvement: Push notifications for appreciates
Improvement: Font size control setting applies to entire thread
Bug fix: Occasional crash when closing a thread
Bug fix: Display proper error message when forum is closed

New feature: Remove all your devices from push notifications
Bug fix: Accurate reflection of push active/inactive status
Bug fix: Individual push settings for news, replies, appreciates, etc working for some users
Bug fix: Sharing panel on iPad now displays

Bug fix: Errant push notifications for certain users fixed. You may re-enable notifications for the app
New feature: Delete multiple PMs at a time
New feature: User online status and join date on member profile
Bug fix: Save button when changing signature now disappears
Bug fix: Fix forum title display in My Forums for certain forums
Bug fix: Search from a subforum in My Forums
Bug fix: Keyboard height fix for some users

New feature: Attach images to post when editing a post
New feature: You can now reorder MyForums
New feature: You can now edit Drafts
Improvement: Clicking username or avatar in left menu brings up your own profile
Improvement: Easier to swipe left to delete PMs, subscriptions, myforums, etc..
Bug fix: Notifications crashes for some users
Bug fix: Sending PM errors for some users

New feature: Manually save drafts of your posts whenever you want
New feature: Attachment manager allows you to add or delete attachments from posts already made
Improvement: Images display faster in gallery mode
Bug fix: Apostrophe bug fix
Bug fix: Member profile crash fixed
Small bug fixes

Improvement: iPhone X Support
Small bug fixes
Small bug fix

Small bug fixes
Improvement: Ability to jump to specific pages of threads

Improvement: Hide notifications on a per thread basis
Improvement: Search refinements
Bug fix: Fixed PMs for some users
Bug fix: Complex user name login fix

New feature: Filter classifieds by Price and Keywords
New feature: Edit price, Mark as Sold for classified items
Bug fix: Garbled quotes for some users

New feature: Reputation bar and Reputation history
Bug fix: Fix sporadic crashes in the Forums section

New feature: Reputation bar and Reputation history
Bug fix: Fix sporadic crashes in the Forums section
Bug fix: Titles in drafts area not displaying

New feature: Highlight thread starter with an ‘OP’ designation
New feature: Swipe right to go back can be enabled via the Settings -> UI menu

Improvement: Direct link to posts now open in app
Bug fix: Strange characters in certain posts are now fixed
Small bug fixes

New feature: New button to show the names of people who appreciated a post
Improvement: Refactored classifieds filters
New feature: Filter classifieds by For Sale and Willing to Buy
New feature: Filters for each classifieds area now save to your device
New feature: Sort classifieds by price, name, ascending, descending

Improvement: Better control of font sizes throughout the app (forum thread listings and reading threads)
Improvement: Refactored news section design
New feature: Thumbnails show in Classifieds listings

New feature: Delete posts from app
New feature: Copy direct link to a post to your clipboard (for sharing)

Modification: Classifieds price now show on the left side of item
Modification: Thread thumbnail (outside of classifieds) return back to the right of text
Bug fix: Threads marked as read in subscription section

Improvement: Member profile image now full screen on large devices
Improvement: Advanced password support
Bug fix: New posts mark as read
Small updates for iOS12
Bug fix: Improved attachment uploads
Bug fix: Attachment uploads
Bug fix: Attachment Uploads when Creating Threads
